titleInfo.title: Modern County Music with Chris Holm Brothers and the Country Squires at the New Casaloma

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red on yellow) announcing the Sound of Country Music concert with the Chisholm Brothers, the Country Squires and Edna Jean Adams at the New Casaloma on September 13. Poster features a metal photoplate of the Chisholm Brothers.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
